pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. -*-restructuredtext-*-.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/ubernostrum/django-referrer-policy.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/ubernostrum/django-referrer-policydjango-referrer-policy provides a middleware class implementing `theReferrer-Policy header <https://www.w3.org/TR/referrer-policy/>`_ for`Django <https://www.djangoproject.com/>`_-powered sites.Setting the ``Referrer-Policy`` header allows you to control what, ifany, information is sent in the HTTP ``Referer`` header when a userclicks a link on your site.Documentation is `available online<https://django-referrer-policy.readthedocs.io/>`_.
